item.title: Mastering Active Directory Security Groups- An In-Depth Guide
item.description: Active Directory is a powerful tool for managing user and computer accounts, as well as controlling access to resources within an organization. At the heart of this access control system are security groups, which provide an efficient way to assign permissions and user rights to collections of users, computers, and other groups. In this comprehensive guide, we’ll dive deep into the world of Active Directory security groups, exploring their functions, scopes, and the default groups that come pre-configured with Windows Server.
